juzs.text: 36|28|Kare no ato, ware wa sono min ni taishi ten kara gunzei o tsukawashi wa shinakatta. Mata-so suru made mo nakatta.
36|29|Tada hitokoe sakebu dake de, kare-ra wa kieusete shimatta.
36|30|A, awarena shimo be-tachi yo. Kare-ra wa shito ga kuru tabi, chosho shite kakatta.
36|31|Kare-ra wa kidzukanai no ka, jibun-tachi izen ni iku sedai no mono o ware ga horoboshi, kare-ra wa 2-do to kaeranai to iu koto o.
36|32|Sorezore mina wa,(shinpan no hi) isseini ware no mae ni mesa reyou.
36|33|Kare-ra e no shirushi no 1tsu to shite wa, ware ga shinda daichi o yomigaera se, kokumotsu o sore kara seisan shi, sore o kare-ra ga taberu koto ga age rareru.
36|34|Mata ware wa, soko ni natsumeyashi ya budo no en o moke, sonoaida ni izumi o waki dasa seru.
36|35|Kare-ra wa sono kajitsu o taberuga, soreha kare-ra no te ga tsukuridashita monode wanai. Soredemo kansha shinai no ka.
36|36|Kare no eiko o tataeru. Kare wa daichi ni haeru mono, kare-ra jishin mo, mata kare-ra no shiranai mono mo, subete shiyu ni tsukura reta katadearu.
36|37|Mata kare-ra e no shirushi ni wa, yoru ga aru. Ware ga sore kara hiru o doka seru to, miyo, makkura ni naru.
36|38|Mata taiyo wa, kisokutadashiku unko suru. Kore mo zen'no zenchina okata no setsuridearu.
36|39|Mata tsuki ni wa, tengu o furiwaketa. (Sore o kayotte) natsumeyashi no oita yohei no yo ni (hosoku natte) modotte kuru.
36|40|Taiyo ga tsuki ni oitsuku koto wa narazu, yoru wa hiru to saki o arasou koto wa dekinai. Sorera wa, sorezore no kido o oyogu.
36|41|Mata mansai shita fune ni, ware ga kare-ra no shison o hakonda koto mo shirushi no 1tsudearu.
36|42|Mata ware wa kare-ra ga noru,(-gai no benrina) norimono o tsukutta.
36|43|Ware ga hossurunaraba, kare-ra o obore saseru koto ga dekiru. So nareba, kare-ra o tasukeru mono wa naku, sukuwa re wa shinai.
36|44|Tada ware no jihi ni yotte tsukanoma o kyoraku suru dakedearu.
36|45|Kare-ra ni mukatte,`anata gata no mae ni aru mono, mata ushiro ni aru mono o osore nasai. So sureba anata gata wa, kanarazu jihi ni azukarerudearou.' To iwa rete mo (mimiwokasudokoroka),
36|46|-nushi kara no shuju no shirushi ga shimesa rete mo, sukkari, se o mukete shimau.

36|47|Mata,`arra ga anata gata ni sadzuke rareta mono o, hodokose.' To iwa reru to, fushinjin'na mono wa shinko suru mono ni iu. `Arra ga o nozominara,(o jibun de) yashinawa reru to iu mono o, doshite watashi-tachi ga yashinau koto ga arimashou ka. Anata gata wa, akiraka ni omoichigai o shite iru dakedesu.'
36|48|Mata, kare-ra wa iu. `Anata gata no iu koto ga shinjitsunaraba, nanji kono (shinpan) no yakusoku (ga hatasa reru no)desu ka.'
36|49|Daga kare-ra ga ronso shite iru ma ni, hitokoe no sakebi ga (totsuzen) kare-ra o osou dakede wanai ka.
36|50|Sonotoki kare-ra wa, yuigon suru koto mo, mata kazoku no tokoro ni kaeru koto mo dekinai.
36|51|Soshite rappa ga fuka reru to, kare-ra wa hakaba kara (dete),-nushi no omoto ni isoideiku.

36|52|Kare-ra wa iu. `A , nasakenai. Watashi-tachi o fushido kara yobiokoshita no wa daredeshou ka. Kore wa, jihibukaki okata ga yakusoku nasa reta toride wa arimasen ka. Shito-tachi no kotoba wa shinjitsudeatta nodesu ka.'
36|53|Tada hitokoe narihibikeba, isseini kare-ra wa ware no mae ni meshi atsume rareru.
36|54|Sonohi ni wa dare mo, sukoshi mo futona atsukai o ukezu, anata gata wa, tada jibun no okonatta koto ni taishi mukui rareru.
36|55|Hontoni rakuen no nakama-tachi wa, kono Ni~Tsu, yorokobi ni 忙 Ga shi.
36|56|Kare-ra wa sono haigusha-tachi to, kokage no nedoko ni yorikakaru.
36|57|Soko de kare-ra wa, kajitsu ya nozomi no mono o nandemo e rareru.
36|58|Jihibukaki nushi kara `heian'are.' To no o kotoba mo aru.
36|59|Anata gata tsumibito-tachi yo, kyo wa hanarete hikae nasai.
36|60|Adamu no shison yo, akuma ni tsukaete wa naranai to, ware wa anata gata ni meirei shinakatta ka. Kare wa anata gata no kozen no tekidearu.
36|61|Anata gata wa ware ni tsukae nasai. Sore koso tadashi michidearu.
36|62|Tashika ni kare (akuma) wa anata gata no daibubun o mayowa seta. Doshite anata gata wa satoranakatta no ka.
36|63|Kore wa anata gata ni yakusoku sa rete ita, jigokudearu.
36|64|Anata gata wa fushinjindeatta tame ni, kyo soko ni hairu nodearu.
36|65|Sonohi ware wa, kare-ra no kuchiwofujiru. Suruto sono-te ga ware ni katari, kare-ra no ashi wa, sono okonatta koto o rissho suru.
36|66|Ware ga nozomeba, kare-ra no ryome o mekura ni suru koto ga dekiru. Kare-ra wa (tengoku e no) michi o sakinjiyou to suruga, doshite mitosu koto ga dekiyou ka.
36|67|Ware ga nozomeba, kare-ra o sono basho de katachi o kaeru koto mo dekiru. So nareba kare-ra wa, iku koto mo kaeru koto mo dekinai.
36|68|Daredemo choju sa seru sai ni wa, ware wa sozo o gyaku ni modora seyou. Kare-ra wa, soredemo satoranai no ka.
36|69|Ware wa kare (muhanmado) ni uta o oshienakatta. Sore wa kare ni fusawashikunai. Kore wa (arra no) kunkai mago kata nai kuruandeari,
36|70|ikeru mono ni keikoku o atae, mata fushinjin'na mono ni taishite wa wa o kotoba ga kudasa reru.
36|71|Ware ga tezukara kare-ra no tame ni tsukutta kachiku o kare-ra ni shoyu sa sete iru no o minai no ka.
36|72|Ware wa, sore o kare-ra (no yo) ni fukusa seta. Sorede, kare-ra wa kore ni nori, soshite taberu.
36|73|Mata kare-ra wa (sono soto ni mo) iroiro sore o riyo shi, mata nomimono o eru. Soredemo kare-ra wa kansha shinai no ka.
36|74|Kare-ra wa, arra no soto ni jashin o erabi nantoka tasuke rareyou to suru.
36|75|Sorera (jashin-tachi) wa, kare-ra o tasukeru chikara wa naku, mushiro kare-ra no kata ga jashin o mamoru tame gunbi o totonoete iru shimatsu.
36|76|Anata wa kare-ra no iu koto de, kanashinde wa naranai. Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra no kakusu koto mo gen wasu koto mo shitte iru.
36|77|Ningen wa kangaenai no ka. Ware wa 一精滴 Kara kare o tsukuttade wanai ka. Sorenanoni miyo, kare wa kozen to ha mukatte iru.
36|78|Mata kare wa, ware ni nazoraeru mono o hikiai ni dashite, jibun no sozo o wasure, iu. `Dare ga, kuchihateta hone o ikikaera semashou ka.'
36|79|Itte yaru ga i. `Saisho ni o tsukuri ni natta kata ga, kare-ra o ikikaera seru. Kare wa subete no hi zobutsu o shiri tsukushite ora reru.
36|80|Midori no ki kara, anata gata no tame ni hi o tsukura reta no mo karedeari, dakarakoso anata gata wa sore ni yotte moyasu.'
36|81|Ten to ji o sozo nasa reta kare ga, kore ni ruisuru mono o tsukuri enaidearou ka. Iya, kare wa saiko no sozo-shadeari, zenchi de ara reru.
36|82|Nanika o nozoma reru to, kare ga `are.' To o meiji ni nareba, sunawachi aru.
36|83|Kare ni koso subete no sho san'are. Sono o te de ban'yu o togyo nasa reru okata, anata gata wa kare no omoto ni kisa reru nodearu.
37|1|Seizento retsu o nasu-sha-tachi ni oi te.
37|2|Karitate ou mono ni oi te.
37|3|Mata kunkai (no kuruan) o yomi kika seru mono ni oite, chikau.
37|4|Hontoni anata gata no kami wa, yuiitsu no omodearu.
37|5|Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono no shu, mata hinode o tsukasa doru omodearu.
37|6|Hontoni ware wa, shinshin de kaso no ten o kazari,
37|7|(arra no meirei ni) sakarau akuma ni taisuru mori to shita.
37|8|Kare-ra wa happo kara uta re, saiko no kaigi o nusumi kiku koto wa dekinai.
37|9|Gekitai sa rete, kare-ra wa towa no chobatsu o ukeru.
37|10|Tocho shi eta mono ga atte mo, hakunetsu no hono ga tsuiseki suru.

37|11|Kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) ni toe. `Kare-ra to ware no tsukutta mono (tenshi) no dochira ga tsuyoku tsukura rete iru ka.' Ware wa motomoto, nebari no aru doro de kare-ra o tsukutta nodearu.
37|12|Anata wa kantan shite iru to iu no ni, kare-ra wa chosho suru.
37|13|Keikoku sa rete mo, kare-ra wa keikoku o ukeirenai.
37|14|Mata kare-ra wa, shirushi o mite mo chosho suru bakari.
37|15|Soshite kare-ra wa iu. `Kore wa akiraka ni majutsu ni chigai arimasen.
37|16|Watashi-tachi ga shinde tsuchi to hone ni natte kara,(mata) yobiokosa remashou ka.
37|17|Toi sosen-tachi mo (issho nidesu ka) to iu.
37|18|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Sonotori. Anata gata wa iyashime rareru nodearu.'
37|19|Sore wa tada hitokoe no sakebidearu. Sonotoki kare-ra wa (osoroshi kokei o) manoatari ni mite,
37|20|`a nasakenai, kore ga shinpan no hidesu ka.' To iu.
37|21|`Kore wa anata gata ga shinjinakatta kubun no hidearu.
37|22|Fugi o okonatte ita-sha-tachi, sono tsuma-tachi, mata kare-ra ga arra o sashioite hai shite ita mono-tachi o atsume nasai.

37|24|Iya, kare-ra o mata sete oke. Kare-ra ni tazuneru koto ga aru.
37|25|Anata gata ga tasukeawanai no wa do shita koto ka.'

37|27|Kare-ra wa tagaini chikadzuki tazune au.
37|28|Ippo wa iu. `Hontoni anata gata wa, migi kara kimashita.'
37|29|Suruto taho wa iu. `Iya, anata gata wa,(motomoto) shinjade wa arimasendeshita.
37|30|Mata, watashi-tachi wa anata gata ni oshitsukeru ken'i mo arimasendeshita. Soreni anata gata wa hangyaku no todeshita.
37|31|Sore de omo no o kotoba ga, watashi-tachi ni jissho sa reta ima, watashi-tachi wa,(chobatsu o) ajiwawaneba naranai.
37|32|Watashi-tachi wa anata gata o mayowa setaga, watashi-tachi jishin mo mayotte ita nodesu.'
37|33|Koshite sonohi, kare-ra wa,(subete) tomoni chobatsu o ukeru.
37|34|Hontoni ware wa kono yo ni tsumi o okashita mono o jobunsuru.
37|35|Kare-ra wa,`arra no soto ni kami wa arimasen.' To tsuge rareru to, itsumo koman ni natta.
37|36|Soshite,`kichigai shijin no tame ni, watashi-tachi no kamigami o sutete naru monodesu ka.' To itte ita.
37|37|Iya, kare wa shinri o motarashite,(kare izen no) yogen-sha-tachi (no Keisuke) o kakusho suru monodearu.
37|38|Anata gata wa, kanarazu itamashi chobatsu o ajiwaudearou.
37|39|Dose mina anata gataga okonatta koto no mukuidearu.
37|40|Daga arra no chuseina shimo be-tachi wa,-betsudearu.
37|41|Sorera no mono ni wa, sadame no onkei ga ari,
37|42|(yorokobashi) kajitsu, soshite eiyo ga (sadzuke rare),
37|43|shifuku no rakuen no naka de,
37|44|nedoko no ue de mukaiau.
37|45|Kiyoi izumi kara kunda hai wa, kare-ra ni yukiwatari,
37|46|mashiro (na bishu wa), nomu mono ni kokochiyoi ama-sa.
37|47|Kore wa, zutsu o moyosazu, yowa se mo shinai.
37|48|Mata kare-ra no soba ni wa, fushime-gachina oki me (no otome) ga iru.
37|49|Ka no on'na-ra wa, chuibukaku mamora rete iru tamago no yo.
37|50|Yagate kare-ra wa, tagaini chikadzuki tazune au.
37|51|Kare-ra no hitori ga, kuchi o kitte iu. `Watashi ni hitori no shitashi tomo ga imashita.
37|52|Kare wa itte ita. “Anata made (fukkatsu no hi o) shinjite iru nodesu ka.
37|53|Watashi-tachi ga shinde tsuchi to hone ni natte kara, hontoni shinpan sa reru nodeshou ka.”'
37|54|Mata itta. `Ma minasan mioroshite mi nasai.'
37|55|Sokode kare ga miorosu to, hi goku no tadanaka ni kare no sugata ga mieta.
37|56|Kare wa itta. `Arra ni kakete, anata wa mosukoshi de watashi o hametsu sa seru tokorodeshita.
37|57|Moshi omo no onmegumi ga nakattanaraba, watashi wa kanarazu hikitate rareru mono no naka ni itadeshou.'
37|58|`Watashi-tachi (rakuen no nakama) wa, saisho no shi dakede mata,
37|59|shinu koto wa nai nodesu ka. Mata, watashi-tachi ga, chobatsu o ukeru koto wa nai nodeshou ka.'
37|60|`-Sodearunara kore wa, shijo no kofuku no jojudesu.
